channel.title: Exision RuneScape [Rs Alternative] Join Now
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Information:[/size] Website: http://exisioninteractives.iblogger.org No registration required to play but we recommend it as it helps us make events in-game with rewards.
[ul][li]Economy[/li][/ul]
Economy runs on both skilling & mobing. 24 skills working with income.(You can make money off anything) Exp Rate : x4 & Drop Rates: 50% to 10% on rare items: Proper gold drops to ensure no inflamation. [/list]
[ul][li]World Features[/li][/ul]
All runescape maps available (2006 - 2007) All runescape items (2006 - 2007) Almost all of runescape mobs & Shops (2006 - 2007) Almost all ladders, doors, stairs work. Music in most areas & sounds.
[ul][li]Server Statistics[/li][/ul]
Game is constantly updated. Free to play 100% with no donator items or features. Server runs on dedicated hosting(uptime 23/7 hours due to restart); Stable & almost lagless (if any lag it comes from user opening too many things at once.) Lightweight client makes game easy to download and play.
[ul][li]Media (not much. i will upload more in due time.[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6ePBU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UhHsV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/99hCL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wZKuK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/25bE0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1F9vb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/02Rye.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fG6lS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lMdTR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AyRlY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/P6XVa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UqI3I.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EqXQj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RybxA.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/O0b4A.png[/img]
[ul][li]Player Statistics[/li][/ul]
Staff at Exision RuneScape take pride in our constant updates to ensure player enjoyment. Dedicated hosting with no donations required. We are looking for in-game moderators but applications are un hold until enough players are registered. No resets of server(Long Term Server)[/list][/list][/list][/list]
